Bestial Fury: Companion may make 2 attacks/rd
Exceptional Training: May use a bonus action to command companion to Dash, Disengage, or Help instead of Attack/Companion attacks count as magical
Healer: Using a healer's kit to stabilize also restores 1 HP/May use a healer's kit to restore 1d6+4 + target HD HP 1/short rest
Ranger's Companion: Companion beast up to CR 1/4 gains +6 Armor Class, attack, damage, skills, and saving throws and obeys self commands
Shelter Of The Faithful: May receive aid from temples of Egyptian-Nephthys and fellow believers

Skill Notes:
Dungeon Delver: Adv on Perception and Investigation (secret door detection)/May search for traps at full speed
Favored Enemy: Adv on Survival to track, Adv on Intelligence to recall info about, and may learn the language of 3 chosen creature types
Feral Senses: R30' Aware of invisible creatures
Hide In Plain Sight: +10 Stealth to hide using prepared camouflage (move or action ends)
Natural Explorer: Dbl Proficiency on Intelligence and Wisdom, moves normally through difficult terrain, never becomes lost, remains always alert, may stealth alone at full speed, locates dbl food, and gains extra info from tracking in 3 chosen terrain types
Vanish: May use a bonus action to hide/Untrackable nonmagically

Alert: +5 Initiative
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Fighting Style (Archery): +2 ranged attacks
Fighting Style (Defense): +1 Armor Class in armor
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Alert: Cannot be surprised/Unseen foes gain no Adv on attacks on self
Colossus Slayer: +1d8 HP damage vs. wounded foe 1/rd
Escape The Horde: Foes have Disadv on OA on self
Feral Senses: Suffers no Disadv vs. invisible foe
Fighting Style (Dueling): +2 damage with a single, one-handed weapon
Fighting Style (Two-Weapon Fighting): Adds ability modifier to second attack damage
Foe Slayer: May gain choice of +3 attack or damage vs. favored enemy 1/rd
Giant Killer: May use Reaction to attack an adjacent Large or larger foe after it misses self
Horde Breaker: May make a second attack on a different adjacent foe 1/rd
Multiattack Defense: After a successful foe attack, gains +4 Armor Class on additional attacks from same foe in same rd
Savage Attacker: May take the best of two melee damage rolls 1/rd
Stand Against The Tide: May use Reaction to redirect a foe melee miss to another creature
Uncanny Dodge: May use Reaction to reduce damage taken from an attack by half
Volley: May make a ranged attack on any number of foes in a 10' radius
Whirlwind Attack: May make a melee attack on any number of adjacent foes

Save Notes:
Dungeon Delver: Adv on trap avoidance and resistance/Has resistance to trap damage
Evasion: Successful Dexterity save yields no damage instead of half; failure yields half damage
Land's Stride: Adv on saves vs. impeding plants
Steel Will: Adv on saves vs. fright
Magic
Spell Slots: R1: 4; R2: 3; R3: 3; R4: 3; R5: 2; W0: 2; W1: 1 Attack: R: 9; W: 7 Spell DC: R: 17; W: 15
Spells:
Animal Friendship (R1 Ench): R30' Target beast becomes convinced of self harmlessness (Wisdom neg; Intelligence 4 or higher immune) for 1 dy [+Level affects +1 target]
Beast Sense (R2 Divi): Self may perceive through touched willing beast's senses for conc up to 1 hr [R]
Color Spray (W1 Illu): 15' cone blinds 6d10 HP of targets for 1 rd [+Level affects +2d10 HP of targets]
Commune With Nature (R5 Divi): Self gains 3 facts about nature w/in 3 miles (300' underground) [R]
Conjure Barrage (R3 Conj): 60' cone inflicts 3d8 HP weapon type (Dexterity half)
Conjure Woodland Beings (R4 Conj): R60' Summons 1/2/4/8 obedient CR 2/1/half/quarter fey creatures for conc, 1 hr, or until slain [+Level doubles/triples creature count at level 6/8]
Cordon Of Arrows (R2 Tran): R5' Four pieces of ammo attack non-designated creatures w/in 30', inflicting 1d6 HP piercing each (Dexterity neg), for 8 hr [+Level affects +2 pieces]
Cure Wounds (R1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+3 HP [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Ensnaring Strike (R1 Conj): Self next successful attack restrains foe and inflicts 1d6 HP/rd piercing (Strength ends) for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Friends (W0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Charisma w/non-hostile target for conc up to 1 min; target becomes hostile afterward
Grasping Vine (R4 Conj): R30' 30' vine pulls target 20' each rd (Dexterity neg) for conc up to 1 min
Jump (R1 Tran): Touched gains triple jump distance for 1 min
Minor Illusion (W0 Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Pass Without Trace (R2 Abju): Targets in a 30' radius gain +10 Stealth and become trackable only by magic for conc up to 1 hr
Plant Growth (R3 Tran): R150' Causes plants to overgrow in a 100' radius or enriches a 1/2 mile radius for 1 yr
Stoneskin (R4 Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for conc up to 1 hr
Swift Quiver (R5 Tran): Touched quiver dispenses ammo endlessly and allows two ranged attacks in a bonus action for conc up to 1 min
Water Breathing (R3 Tran): R30' 10 targets may breathe underwater for 1 dy [R]
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Knows 2 W0 spells/May cast chosen W1 spell 1/long rest
Primeval Awareness: May spend a spell slot to sense creatures in a 1 mile radius (favored terrain 6 mile radius) for 1 min/slot level
Share Spells: R30' May have self spell also affect companion
